__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[RobertHeck]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[JimCrossley]]</nowiki>
* Make: Asus
* Model: Z70V

=== Current Issues ===
* <!> DRI and 3D acceleration can be enabled by installing the linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r) and then xorg-driver-fglrx package. You may also need to correct a symbolic link by doing a 'sudo ln -s /usr/lib/xorg/modules/dri /usr/X11R6/lib/modules/dri' described in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg-driver-fglrx/+bug/46239|bug #46239]]</nowiki>.
* <!> There is a <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/gnome-media/+bug/41999|bug]]</nowiki> in the package gtk2-engines-gtk-qt that inverts the Gnome volume control. Removing ~/.gtkrc-2.0 solves the issue.
* {X} Suspend with the default settings freezes X during the resume process. Suspend2 worked in Breezy using <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=75443|this method]]</nowiki> of re-compiling the kernel and probably will work if you do the same in Dapper using a similar <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=150864|updated method]]</nowiki> (disregarding the irrelevant Nvidia parts). 

=== Notes ===
* {i} For 'ClearType' like font rendering, <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=180647|these patches]]</nowiki> work great on Dapper.
